title: Android 12 is now available for the Asus ZenFone 7 and 7 Pro
content:
The rollout of Android 12 has been swift on some devices, and relatively slow on others. But right on schedule, Asus just released its Android 12 update for the ZenFone 7 series.

moreâ€¦

The post Android 12 is now available for the Asus ZenFone 7 and 7 Pro appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: While it's taken a few months to arrive, Asus has officially released the Android 12 update for its ZenFone 7 and ZenFone 7 Pro from 2020.
